abstract: Simon & Schuster executive Zareen Jaffery launches imprint Salaam Reads, which will focus on literature for Muslim-American children; says books will not focus on theology but feature Muslim characters and stories.
lead_paragraph: Salaam Reads, which has acquired four books for 2017, is likely to further fuel the discussion about diversity in children’s publishing.

headline.main: Simon & Schuster Creates Imprint for Muslim-Themed Children’s Books
headline.print_headline: Imprint Offers Literature for Muslim Children

snippet: Salaam Reads, which has acquired four books for 2017, is likely to further fuel the discussion about diversity in children’s publishing.
